SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI

Class ViewCLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.ViewCLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View, Runnable
public class ViewCLI extends Object implements View, Runnable
This class represents the Command Line Interface (CLI) view of the game. It implements the View interface and the Runnable interface.

  • Method Details

    • setUsername

      public void setUsername() throws IOException, InterruptedException, ServerDisconnectedException
      This method is used to set the username of the player.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted.
      ServerDisconnectedException - If the server is disconnected.

    • setChoiceGame

      public int setChoiceGame() throws ServerDisconnectedException
      This method is used to set the choice of the game.
      Returns:
      1 if the player creates a game, 2 if the player joins a game, 0 if the player quits the game.
      Throws:
      ServerDisconnectedException - If the server is disconnected.

    • setReady

      public boolean setReady() throws ServerDisconnectedException
      This method is used to set the ready status of the player
      Returns:
      true if the player is ready, false if the player quits the game
      Throws:
      ServerDisconnectedException - if the server disconnects

      This method is used to start the game loop.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      NotExistingPlayerException - If the player does not exist.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted.
      CardTypeMismatchException - If the card type does not match.
      ServerDisconnectedException - If the server is disconnected.
